Fix launch.bat: prevent ''nul'' file creation when run from PowerShell

Replace >nul with 1>NUL 2>NUL to avoid creating a file named ''nul''
which blocks git operations on Windows.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
